ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CI_Web_to_Lead__c = 'Si', ISCHANGED( CI_Origen__c ), OR( $Profile.Name != 'B2BMA Integration User', $Profile.Name = 'Administrador del sistema', $Profile.Name = 'System Administrator' ) )
